automenta.vivisect.surfaceplotter.surface

Class Projector

  • java.lang.Object
    • automenta.vivisect.surfaceplotter.surface.Projector

  • public final class Projector
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Projector projects points in 3D space to 2D space.
    Author:
    Yanto Suryono
